rule.name: accessevent
rule.title: COM_XIPT_ACCESSEVENT
rule.example: Suppose you want Profile Type1 users Can not Access Events of profile type2/ 1.General Parameter-> Self Profiletype to apply rule -> Select Profile Type1 /2.Rule Parameters-> Other profiletype users to apply rule -> Select Profile Type2
